oai_dc:dc.dc:title: U.S.S. Nashville (CL-43), circa 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of the USS Nashville (CL-43), a light cruiser of the Brooklyn-class cruiser that was launched on 2 October 1937. This ship was sponsored by Misses Ann and Mildred Stahlman of Nashville, Tennessee and was commissioned on 6 June 1938, Captain William W. Wilson in command.[4]Forms part of the Ridley Wills II Nashville Postcards Collection. 1 postcard.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wills, Ridley, 1934-
Nashville (Cruiser : CL43)
